title.rendered: Short-Term Course on Computational Fluid Dynamics and Machine Learning at IIT Indore [25 Seats, July 2-8; PG Graduates]: Apply by June 28

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the 7-Days Short-Term Course on Computational Fluid Dynamics & Machine Learning at IIT Indore. The last date for application is June 28, 2023.

About IIT Indore

Indian Institute of Technology Indore is one of the centrally funded premier institutions under the Ministry of Education, Government of India, located in Indore, India. IIT Indore is ranked 14th in NIRF 2023. The institute worked from 2009 to 2010 in a temporary campus at the Institute of Engineering and Technology of Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya under the mentorship of IIT Bombay with Dr. Pradeep Mathur as the founding director. The first batch of IIT Indore graduated in 2013, and the institute celebrated its first Convocation Day on 8 June 2013.

About Course

IIT Indore is inviting applications for a 7-Days short-term course on “Computational Fluid Dynamics and Machine Learning: An Introduction” from July 2-8, Prof. Dhinakaran (Coordinator), under the ACCELERATE Vigyan Scheme through Karyashala Program funded by the Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), Govt. of India.

Scope

To support regular PG level students (25 students only) having a strong orientation towards scientific and engineering research, and are pursuing their degree from University within India in the fields of Science & Engineering and having an interest in scientific research.

Eligibility Criteria

  • PG students from universities, colleges, and private academic institutions.
  • UG students, Faculty members, and Scientists can also apply but will have to pay a registration fee.

Event Details

National, Offline mode at IIT Indore.

Perks

e-Certificate, will be given at the end of the course.

Important Dates

  • Registration Deadline: June 28, 2023.
  • Course Period: July 2-8, 2023.

Registration

Interested and eligible candidates can register online through this link.

Registration Fee

  • For PG students: FREE
  • For UG students & Faculty members: Rs. 2,500 + 18% GST (Total: Rs. 2,950).
  • For Scientists: Rs. 5,000 + 18% GST (Total: Rs. 5,900).

Click here to view the official notification of the Short-Term Course on Computational Fluid Dynamics and Machine Learning at IIT Indore.
